title: L'Evêque
text: L'Evêque is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Pennine%20Alps">Pennine Alps</a>, overlooking the <a href="Col%20Collon">Col Collon</a> in the canton of <a href="Valais">Valais</a>, south of <a href="Mont%20Collon">Mont Collon</a>. With a height of 3,716 meters above sea level, it is one of the highest summits in the <a href="Arolla">Arolla</a> valley.
